about.title: About
about.summary: Fillarivahti records the availability of each bike station in the Helsinki region. The yellow line graphs today's availability, and the gray area shows the weekday's average availability. The black, dashed line visualizes full capacity, and helps put things in perspective. The collected information is also used to estimate bike availability in the near future.
about.sources: If you're interested to check out how the site was built, the sources are available on Github. The repository includes the availability recorder and the API for reading them, as well.

bikeStationSearch.locationHelp: Search for bike stations near you
bikeStationSearch.networkError: Something went wrong while fetching stations :( Reloading the site might help.
bikeStationSearch.noResults: No results. You can search for bike stations by their name or your location.

meta.title: Fillarivahti - HSL city bike availability and trends
meta.description: Fillarivahti visualizes the current availability and trend of Helsinki area city bikes.
